meanings.definition: The skin of a sheep with the wool still attached.
meanings.sent1: The woolfell was soft and warm against her skin.
meanings.sent2: He bought a woolfell to use as a cozy rug in his living room.
meanings.sent3: The sheep wearing the woolfell looked quite fashionable.
meanings.sent4: The woolfell draped over the chair like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: She wrapped herself in the woolfell to stay toasty on the cold night.

meanings.definition: A sheepskin with the wool still on it.
meanings.sent1: The woolfell kept the baby warm during the winter.
meanings.sent2: The shepherd collected the woolfell to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The sheep wearing the woolfell seemed quite proud of its stylish coat.
meanings.sent4: The woolfell was a cozy blanket for the tired traveler.
meanings.sent5: Sheep love to roll around in the woolfell to scratch their backs.
